      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Board.canElementBePutAtPosition(Position position, Element element)
      Returns whether the given element can be placed on this board at the given position.
      boolean Board.canElementBePutAtPosition(Position position, Element element, java.util.Map<Position,java.util.Set<Element>> elements)
      Returns whether the given element can be placed on this board at the given position with the given set of elements.
      void Board.moveElement(Position position, Element element)
      Moves a given element from one place on this board to another place on this board if possible.
      void Board.putElement(Position position, Element newElement)
      Places a given element on this board on a given position if this element can be placed there.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double Robot.getEnergyRequiredToReach(Position position)
      Returns the minimum amount of energy, expressed in watt-second [Ws], this robot needs to move to the given position.
      void Robot.moveNextTo(Robot other)
      Moves this robot and the given robot as close as possible to each other consuming as little energy as possible and taking in account the current energy they have.
      void Robot.transferItems(Robot other)
      Transfers all the items of this robot to the given other robot if possible.
